price: 18. Ragga iyo haweenka wax sadaqaysta ee amaahiya Alle amaah wanaagsan, waa loo labo-laabi (ajarka) waxayna leeyihiin Abaal gud Wanaagsan (Janno).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُصَّدِّقَٰتِ وَأَقۡرَضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muṣadiqīna wal-muṣadiqāti wa-aqraḍū al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan yuḍāʿafu lahum walahum ajrun karīmun
translations: and the women who give charity
